content.content: Ministry of Trade and Industry 100 High Street #09-01 The Treasury Singapore 179434
Mondays to Fridays: 9:00am to 6:00pm Saturdays, Sundays and Public Holidays: Closed

details: For companies that have received emails from haze@mti.gov.sg requesting your company's updated contact information, you may reach us at haze@mti.gov.sg for further enquiries. Thank you.
For a comprehensive listing of contact details, please visit MTI's directory at the Singapore Government Directory Interactive.
Please contact mti_email@mti.gov.sg or Quality Service Line: 1800-2213005.

items: For any enquiries or feedback on our data protection policies and procedures,
If you require more information on or access to the data which you have earlier provided to us.

details: For other career related inquiries, contact: mti_hr@mti.gov.sg.

content.content: Get in touch and we will walk you through the rest.
